2164.subject: BUS
2164.descrlong:
Introduces the concepts of planning, analysis, & design of modern information systems (IS). Covers structured analysis/design, rapid prototyping techniques, & project management. Investigates the complex nature of IS, dynamic & iterative nature of the systems development life cycle (SDLC), & the challenges in the socio-technical process of designing & implementing successful IS. (In-class, hybrid, or online format).

[(Prereq or Coreq: BUS 308) and (Junior or Senior Standing)]
